title: Billing - Handle Billing Dispute
description: A client is disputing a charge on their invoice for 'After-Hours Project Work' that they claim was not approved.

tasks.description: Locate the specific invoice and the time entries associated with the disputed charge.
tasks.expected_outcome: The account manager finds the time entries for the after-hours work.

tasks.description: Review the project's communication history for an email or ticket where the client approved the after-hours work.
tasks.expected_outcome: The account manager finds an email from the client's point of contact approving the work.

tasks.description: Present the proof of authorization to the client to justify the charge.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client agrees to the charge after seeing the proof of approval.
